text: Hiçbirimiz burada oturup Tuğtekin Bey’i bekleyecek değiliz.
english: of us are going to sit here and wait for Mr. Tuğtekin.

text: Hakikat ortaya çıkacak. Başka yolu yok.
english: The truth will come out. There's no other way.

text: Ya aç köpekler gibi burada birbirimizi yiyeceğiz…
english: Either we will devour each other here like hungry dogs…

text: …ya da kurt gibi düşmanımızın boğazına çökeceğiz.
english: …or we will pounce on our enemy's throat like wolves .

text: Şimdi, bu işi benim kardeşimin yaptığı ortaya çıkarsa…
english: Now, if it turns out that my brother did this …
… I will neither expect Seljuk justice…
I will kill him with my own hands. That

text: İşte bu sebepten, bir an evvel Tuğtekin Bey’i bulmamız icap eder.
english: is why we need to find Mr. Tuğtekin as soon as possible. Let

text: Allah’a dua edelim de dirisini bulalım.
english: us pray to God that we find him alive.
Let us find it so that peace may come to our village. What's
I'll come too. I won't leave
Alps. Let's begin in the name of God

text: Gün ağardı ama hâlâ bir iz bulamayız.
english: Dawn has broken, but we still haven't found a trace. It was as if the

text: Yer yarıldı, yerin içine girdi sanki.
english: ground had split open and swallowed it .

text: Bilesin ki sana bunu söylemek beni çok üzer.
english: Know that telling you this makes me very sad.

text: Lakin kardeşin iflah olmaz bir eşkıya olmuştur Gündoğdu.
english: But your brother has become an incorrigible outlaw, Gündoğdu. If

text: Vaktinde onu dizginleseydiniz, bütün bunlar olmazdı.
english: you had restrained him in time, none of this would have happened.

text: Beyim, hele bir Tuğtekin’i bulalım da…
english: Sir, let's first find Tugtekin... then we'll talk about
(Sound of giving a command to a horse)
Ertuğrul, where are you? How could you take

text: Yavaş konuş. Her tarafta onu ararlar.
english: Speak slowly. They search for him everywhere.
I set a trap for the Mongols through Kocabaş.
But Tuğtekin learned it from Gökçe and then came back. He
wanted to fight. He came after me when I

text: Ben cenk etmek istemeyince peşime düştü.

english: What a mess you've gotten us into, Ertuğrul.

text: Hadi ben inandım sana, diğer insanları nasıl inandıracaksın?
english: Okay, I believe you, but how are you going to convince the other people?

text: Kocabaş hain abi. Tuzağı o kurdu.
english: Kocabaş is a traitor, brother. He set the trap. With that kind of

text: Sende bu akıl olduktan sonra daha çok iş açılır başımıza.

text: Hadi obaya dön. Hakkında hüküm verilsin.
english: the camp. Let a verdict be passed on him.
I will take you to the village with my own hands.

text: Buralarda hiç iz yok beyim. Kendini yormayasın.
english: traces around here, sir. Don't tire yourself out. Let's go back
The snake's lair is the Kayı tribe's encampment. If we don't
storm the tent and demand an accounting for our lord ...
...every breath we take will be forbidden to us. What a shame for
our Alpine heritage. It was Ertuğrul who
sowed discord among us . When a woman is the one

text: Koca Kayı Obasına yol gösteren avrat olunca, hâl böyle olur işte.
english: guiding the entire Kayı tribe , this is what happens.
We've seen that a woman can't be a good husband.

text: Oğlunu korumak isterken, beyimizin ölümüne sebep oldu.
english: In trying to protect his son, he caused our lord's death. They're

text: Tuğtekin ölmüş. Kurda kuşa yem olmuş.
english: Tugtekin is dead. It has become food for wolves and birds.
Stopping is not something we should do.
They should be held accountable for this.
Let them give (Rabarba)! Let 's hold them accountable for this. Give it

's hold them accountable for this. The
(man) should be held accountable. They will be held accountable for this.

text: Çok yakında orada sen oturacaksın ağabey.
english: You'll be sitting there very soon, big brother. Sitting

text: …şu kokmuş koyun postunun üstünde oturup hüküm sürmek…

english: What do you say, big brother?

text: Verdiğimiz bunca emek, döktüğümüz bunca kan…
english: All this effort, all this blood we've shed...

text: Konya’da gördüm ki yepyeni bir cihan kurulur.
english: In Konya, I witnessed the creation of a brand new world.

text: Ve gayrı bu cihanda sürüsünün peşindeki göçerin yeri yoktur.
english: And there is no place in this world for the nomad following his flock.

text: Biz Selçuklu’ya değil, Selçuklu bize siper olmalı.
english: We shouldn't be shielding the Seljuks; the Seljuks should be shielding us. It is time for us to

text: Kendimize yurt bulup, bu bereketli topraklar üzerinde kök salma vaktidir.
english: find a home for ourselves and put down roots in this fertile land. If

text: Öyle ya da böyle bunu beceremezsek, şu kokmuş keçe kefenimiz…
english: we fail to manage this one way or another, these stinking felt shrouds of ours...
...the pastures will become our graves, and the winter quarters will become our hell. Our destiny is
not in the nomadic encampment… but in the principalities of the

text: Ya biz bu cihana ayak uydururuz…
english: Either we adapt to this world …

text: …ya da ayak sürer, Moğol’un kancığı olur çıkarız.
english: …or we drag our feet and end up as the treacherous wives of the Mongols.

text: Velhasıl Ertuğrul, ben yapmadım der, başka da bir şey demez ana.
english: In short, Ertuğrul just says, "I didn't do it," and nothing else to his mother.

text: …sana yanaşmak için bir oyunmuş demek ki.
english: ...was just a game to get close to you, I guess.

text: Bunu da becerdi ana. Noyan’ın itini çadırıma kadar aldım.
english: She managed that too, mom. I took Noyan's dog all the way to my tent.

text: Kim bilir ardımdan başka ne işler çevirmiştir.
english: Who knows what other things she's been plotting behind my back? While

text: …Noyan savaşı çoktan kazanmış da haberimiz yokmuş.
english: Noyan had already won the war, and we didn't even know it.

text: Demek sonunda Ertuğrul Bey’in dediği yere geldiniz.
english: So you've finally arrived at the place Ertuğrul Bey mentioned.

text: Ta başından beri, çolaklığını bahane edip…
english: From the very beginning, you used his disability as an excuse...

text: …geçkin avrat gibi Ertuğrul Bey’i obaya hapsetmek istediniz.
english: ...to try and confine Ertuğrul Bey to the tribe like an old woman . The more

text: O size fırtınayı söyledikçe, onu ezmeye çalıştınız.
english: he told you about the storm, the more you tried to crush it. When
you couldn't subdue them, you drove them out of the village.
But the storm is right in the middle of the village.

text: Söyleyin. Şimdi ne halt edeceksiniz, ha?
english: Tell me. Now what the hell are you going to do, huh?
What the hell are you going to do, huh?

text: Gayrı bu işi nasıl çözeriz bilemem ana.
english: I don't know how we're going to solve this problem, Mom.
Kocabaş is a traitor. He's a traitor too…
…how do we prove it? Huh, how?

text: Ana, ben Alpleri otağın önüne, ardına yerleştirdim.
english: Mother, I positioned the Alps in front of and behind the tent.
What do you say, son? The
Dodurga Alps are the motherland, the angry ones.

text: Bu ateş iki obayı da yakacak.
english: This fire will burn both villages.
What was I supposed to do? We

text: Bir an evvel yola çıkmamız lazım Deli Demir.
english: need to leave as soon as possible, Crazy Demir.

text: Atlarımız yağızdır. Kuş olup uçarız. Sen merak etme kızım.
english: Our horses are black. We become birds and fly away. Don't worry, my daughter.
-Peace be upon you. -Peace be upon you, Sheikh. Welcome.

text: Her daim cenge hazır vaziyettesiniz. Maşallah, maşallah.
english: You are always ready for battle. Mashallah, mashallah.

text: Lakin düşman yakamızdan düşmez ki biz de pusatı bırakalım.
english: But the enemy won't leave us alone, so we won't lay down our arms.
My Sheikh, won't you join us?
We sent Ertuğrul to fight the enemy.

text: Lakin bunca vakit oldu, hâlâ dönmedi.
english: But all this time has passed, and he still hasn't returned. An
enemy is like the devil. How
? Who is the greatest helper in

text: …bir insanı Allah’ın salih kullarından yapan en büyük yardımcı kimdir?

devil, the devil. The greatest helper in

text: Bir insanı salih eyleyecek olan en büyük yardımcı şeytandır.
english: making a person righteous is Satan.

text: Çünkü eğer kul şeytanla, nefsiyle mücadele etmezse…
english: Because if a person does not struggle against Satan and his own desires,
he cannot become a righteous person. He cannot attain true faith.

text: Varlıkların en akıllısı olduğuna inanan şeytan…
english: The devil, who believes himself to be the most intelligent of beings…

text: …bir kulu gözüne kestirip, var gücüyle saldırır.
english: …sets his sights on one of his followers and attacks with all his might.
He thinks he can lead the servant astray.

text: Hâlbuki o kulun arif olması için gece gündüz çabalamaktadır.
english: Yet, He strives day and night to make that servant wise. Even though

text: Şeytan, insanı yoldan çıkarmak için çabalasa da…
english: Satan tries to lead man astray …

text: …salih kul ona boyun eğmez. Şeytana uymaz.
english: …the righteous servant does not submit to him. He does not obey the devil.
His faith grows stronger as he disobeys.
His sincerity will be blessed. The
enemy is like the devil. He keeps trying to make a hero out of the

text: Öldürmeyi düşündüğü kişiyi kahraman etmek için çalışır durur da…
Halime kızım, Allah bize salih bir iman nasip etsin.
english: My dear Halime, may God grant us a righteous faith. May

text: Şeytanla, düşmanla mücadele edecek irade versin.
english: He grant you the will to fight the devil, your enemy. May God give him
wisdom. Let him/her give his/her heart .
God give you strength in your heart.

text: Derviş, sen var emanete sahip çık.
english: Dervish, you must safeguard what has been entrusted to you .

english: My lord, if anything were to happen to you

! If I can't figure this out, I'll let

text: Ben obam ve milletim için can vermeye baş koydum.

text: Hem bugün hem de yarın. Bekleyeceğim.

n't worry. He will receive it. Please forgive me
